title: Field Practicum and Complex Adaptive System-Based Self-Efficacy Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge in Education and Understanding of Primary Education Curricula
context.additional_context: Blended curriculum combining field practice with a complex adaptive system in mobile learning environments utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Preservice elementary teachers enhance their ability to support students with special needs in actual classroom settings through a 13-week field practicum.
Preservice elementary teachers improve their self-efficacy in flexibly responding to diverse educational situations by applying complex adaptive system design principles.
Preservice elementary teachers conduct weekly self-assessments and feedback management via case-based learning modules provided on a mobile microlearning platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
